solution_line_template: If the number of candies was {total_candies}, and {sour_percentage} percent were sour, then there were {sour_percentage}*{total_candies} =<<{sour_percentage}*{total_candies}={sour_candies}>>{sour_candies} sour candies.
The number of good candies was {total_candies}-{sour_candies}=<<{total_candies}-{sour_candies}={good_candies}>>{good_candies}
The number of people who received candy is Henley, {henley}+ {brothers} brothers = <<{henley}+{brothers}={num_people}>>{num_people} people
if they divided the good candies equally, each person got {good_candies}/{num_people} = <<{good_candies}/{num_people}={candies_per_person}>>{candies_per_person} candies.
